scripts.build: npm run compile-wasm && npm run compile-ts && npm run load-statics
scripts.compile-wasm: wasm-pack build --target web --release --out-dir ./build/pkg && npm run clean-build
scripts.load-statics: copy index.html build\index.html && copy manifest.json build\manifest.json && esbuild --minify popup.css --outfile=./build/popup.css
